The claim was fact: checked by an expert who examined the credibility of the source that initially made the claim, in this case, the "America's Last Line of Defense" website.
The expert analyzed the legislative proc: Cortez, as a freshman U.S. Representative, cannot pass a bill on her own. The expert explained that she can only propose legislation and co-sponsor bills.
The expert highlighted that Ocasio: Cortez had not sponsored any bills related to textbooks or Robert E. Lee at the time of the fact-check. This information verified the inaccuracy of the claim.
